src_original: @#/_/dbang gi sbyin sreg sbyor ka ni/_/sa gzhi dmar ba'i thab
kha khyer mu ran gnyis dang bzhi/_/gri gug gam gzhus ni dbus su mtshhan/_/
pad+ma dmar po 'dab brgyad la'o/_/bud shing dmar po tshher ma'i shing /_/yam
shing sor ni bcu gnyis sam/_/sor brgyad tshhad la dri mar bsku/_/mchod rdzas
dmar po g.yas su gzhag_/mar la sogs pa'i sreg rdzas ni/_/dmar
pa'i 'dug stangs nub phyogs blta/_/dmar po la sogs rgyan chas bgo/
sngags kyis gsum mam bdun/_/lha yi nyi shu rtsha brgyad sngags/_/bdun nam
